basic_node.title: Fraction of single beam hitting an object part
basic_node.description: Incomplete incidence of single beam on object part because object part size being smaller than beam cross section or beam hitting the edge of an object part.
basic_node.references: [sp55, https://doi.org/10.14372/IEMEK.2017.12.1.43] [sp55, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9127841/] [sp55, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9495137/, See bleeding. No differentiation between fraction of main beam and fraction of light from across main beam cross section illuminating object parts; here.]
